price: নিশ্চয় অপৰাধীবিলাকে স্থায়ীভাৱে জাহান্নামৰ শাস্তি ভোগ কৰিব;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
